mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.action.ActionExecuteException
mdException.label: Action execute exception
mdException.description: Thrown when trying to execute an action in the PENDING status
mdException.message: A pending action must be accepted before it can be executed

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.PostalCodeFormatException
mdException.label: Postal code format exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a code does not represent a valid postal code
mdException.message: The code [{code}] does not represent a valid postal code for type [{typeLabel}]

mdException.name: net.geoprism.registry.io.PostalCodeLocationException
mdException.label: Postal code location exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a postal code does not have a known location in the system
mdException.message: The code [{code}] does not represent a known location for type [{typeLabel}]. Please create it first
